item.title: Trish add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "How can you thank a man for giving you what's already yours? How then can you thank him for giving you only part of what is yours?" -- Malcolm X

item.title: Trish add a quote by Carolyn G. Heilbrun
item.description: "We women have lived too much with closure: "If he notices me, if I marry him, if I get into college, if I get this work accepted, if I get this job" -- there always seems to loom the possibility of something being over, settled, sweeping clear the way for contentment. This is the delusion of a passive life. When the hope for closure is abandoned, when there is an end to fantasy, adventure for women will begin." -- Carolyn G. Heilbrun

item.title: Trish add a quote by Ram Dass
item.description: "We're all just walking each other home." -- Ram Dass
